doc.name: LatticeOntologySolver
doc.description:
An instance of this solver contains an ontology, which itself contains a ConceptGraph and default constraints. The LatticeOntologySolver contains an Ontology whose ConceptGraph must be a lattice. It uses the Rehof-Mogensen algorithm to resolve which Concepts are assigned to model components.

This class is based on the PropertyConstraintSolver in the properties package by Man-Kit Leung.
doc.author: Man-Kit Leung, Edward A. Lee, Charles Shelton, Ben Lickly, Dai Bui, Beth Latronico
doc.property:
Indicate whether to compute the least or greatest fixed point solution.
  • "least" Solve for least fixed point
  • "greatest" Solve for greatest fixed point
A single parameter for quickly selecting common solving strategies, plus a "custom" option to allow a user-defined strategy.
